Subject: Re: Epstein

>> "Ray Ormond" 07/23/2019 11:46 >>
Lamine - The memo is very confusing. Please draft an email of his actions and current status. Also include what plans were in motion to move him to a GP unit. It will need

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing Epstein, with redactions of personal information and email addresses. The text is mostly printed, with some HTML tags visible. The document quality is good, with no significant damage or redactions affecting the overall readability.
